text:
Way to help a gal get her tent set
up! That was seriously a rock-star
move. I got you a sweet DIY recipe
as a sort of thank-you gift. Oh! And
if you don't know about DIY stuff
yet, go bug Tom Nook ASAP.

Remember when I said I was gonna
mail you something? Well, here's
that something! I can't wait to
see what you're gonna do with
it. 2\0n\0's gonna look
so, so awesome!
